full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 204-3 Filed 04/16/21 Page 337 of 348 By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them. R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA UNITED STATES ATTORNEY Dated: By: A. MARIE VILLAFANA ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY Dated: JEFFREY EPSTEIN Dated: GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ. COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN Dated: 9-24-07 LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ. ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN Page 7 of 7 DOJ-OGR-00003513

text_blocks.content: By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA UNITED STATES ATTORNEY

additional_notes: The document is a Non-Prosecution Agreement signed by Jeffrey Epstein and his attorneys. The document has handwritten date '9-24-07' and signatures.
